short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Soccer Random right in your Chrome browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the help of this Chrome extension, now you can challenge your friends with a Soccer Random game right in your browser with a single click.

Soccer Random is a fun little online soccer game. You control 2 players in a series of short and random matches.

You can play against the computer or a friend.

The objective is to score 5 goals to win the match. Use your mouse or arrow keys to randomly jump and kick the ball into the net.

You can also download the Soccer Random app on your mobile phone from Play Store or App Store.

Try it out and see how many goals you can score. Enjoy the game.
